job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of creating data (questions and answers) to facilitate the training of AI models, which is a core component of the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking AI-generated code is a form of model evaluation and fine-tuning, fitting under the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Outlier is op zoek naar getalenteerde programmeurs om te helpen bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen.
job_tasks.justification: This initial sentence sets the context for the role, indicating the company's objective (training generative AI models) and the type of talent they are seeking, which relates to understanding the business need for AI model training.

soft_skills.phrase: flexibele werkuren, zodat je kunt werken wanneer het jou het beste uitkomt.

classification.rationale: The role focuses on training and evaluating AI models by creating and assessing data related to computer science. While it involves generative AI, the emphasis is on the model training and evaluation process rather than building user-facing applications or advanced GenAI system design.
